name: 📧 Email to Telegram with AI Summary
description: Receive new emails, process with AI, and send summary to Telegram chat

configuration.keywords: important, urgent, meeting, project, proposal, deadline, review

configuration.prompt:
📧 **EMAIL ANALYSIS**

Analyze this email and provide a clear, structured summary for Telegram:

🎯 **QUICK SUMMARY** (1-2 sentences)
📋 **ACTION ITEMS** (if any, use bullet points)
⏰ **DEADLINES** (if mentioned)
🚨 **PRIORITY LEVEL**: High/Medium/Low
👥 **KEY PEOPLE** (important contacts mentioned)

Keep it concise but comprehensive. Use emojis for better readability in Telegram.

If this is spam or promotional content, respond with: 'SKIP: Promotional/Spam email'
